Poker Camp is a project by [Ross Rheingans-Yoo](mailto:ross@poker.camp) and [Max Chiswick](mailto:max@poker.camp).

![](./assets/mr_crop.png)

## Mission

Teaching practical decision-making and rationality, blending real-world skills with theoretical insights

## Max bio 

- Former online poker pro on PokerStars, playing over 10m hands including 990k in 1 month (record for most ever played in a month above microstakes)

- AI poker research: 

  - MSc with thesis on AI poker at Technion Israel Institute of Technology with [Nahum Shimkin](https://webee.technion.ac.il/shimkin/index.html)

  - [Two poker research papers](https://arxiv.org/search/cs?searchtype=author&query=Chiswick,+M) with [Sam Ganzfried](http://www.ganzfriedresearch.com/)

- [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/maxchiswick/)
